title: "swiss bank notes"
output: html_notebook
date: "2025-03-17"
---

# library
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```



# load dataset
```{r}
data = read.table('bank2.dat')
colnames(data) = c('X1','X2','X3','X4','X5','X6')
attach(data)
head(data)
```


# summary
```{r}
print('Quartiles:')
summary(data)

print('NAs:')
sapply(data, function(x) sum(is.na(x)))
```



# pairs plot
```{r}
pairs(data, upper.panel = NULL)

ggplot(data.frame(X5, X6), aes(x = X5, y = X6, color = c(rep(1, 100), rep(2, 100)))) +
geom_point() +
labs(title = "Swiss bank notes") 
 
```
